personalInfo.name: Faizan Hameed
personalInfo.bio: Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in PERN/MERN stacks and hands-on experience in building scalable, production-ready applications. Proficient in Docker, Redis, CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, and modern development best practices. Passionate open-source contributor and founder of a gaming-focused social media platform.

experience.description: Built a scalable social media platform for gamers from scratch. Implemented real-time chat, authentication, and scalable backend systems.
Worked on enterprise-level projects using Node.js, React, PostgreSQL. Implemented CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions.
Developed full-stack features, dashboards, and API integrations. Enhanced performance and security of web applications.

featuredProjects.description: A scalable social media platform for gamers with real-time chat, authentication, and scalable backend systems.
